arts.ttl: Sergio Ramos off the mark in his second outing for Monterrey
arts.sum: His first goal for his new club brought back memories of his golden days at Real Madrid - and it was his old Madrid teammate Sergio Canales who supplied the cross. The Spanish defender, who made his debut last week against Atl√©tico San Luis, scored his first goal for his new club in his second appearance.

arts.ttl: Ramos scores first Monterrey goal and Messi left out
arts.sum: Former Real Madrid captain Sergio Ramos scores his first goal for Monterrey since joining Mexican side, while Lionel Messi left out by Inter Miami.
